name: VEGAPULS Air 41
description: The VEGAPULS Air 41 radar sensor is ideal for autarkic, non-contact level measurement of bulk solids and liquids. It is particularly suited for use in mobile silos containing dry mortar, concrete, or plaster, as well as in a wide range of liquid tanks. With simple and reliable mounting and no need for an external power supply, it offers a highly economical and low-maintenance solution.
author: Akenza AG
